channel.title: This is a bit ridiculous
channel.description: [img]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/323/botsb.png[/img] Is it really that hard to spot the bots?

item.title: This is a bit ridiculous
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:20, topic:397687”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=494825.msg3618580#msg3618580 date=1307203589]

Back in 2007 we admired this (as a community, more or less a player)

Back in 2007 if you wanted perfect scripts that ran in massive amounts like this you didn’t get to rsbuddy and click one, today you can do that.
[/quote]Very true, and the bots weren’t as powerful as they are today. They used color ids for bots, instead of ids, so they didn’t really do anything[/quote]
Lol I remember back then trying to set my willow cutting bots to go on a color that only the willow trees had. xD took like 15 mins just to get the color and it would break down after an hour.

Read full topic

Back in 2007 we admired this (as a community, more or less a player)
[/quote]
Back in 2007 if you wanted perfect scripts that ran in massive amounts like this you didn’t get to rsbuddy and click one, today you can do that.[/quote]Very true, and the bots weren’t as powerful as they are today. They used color ids for bots, instead of ids, so they didn’t really do anything

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I’ve botted a few times, but come on…

Yeah, they were that armor combo cause they don’t need any quests

fucking goldfoaress
and areess4coynnnn

item.title: This is a bit ridiculous
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“deans1243, post:14, topic:397687”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=494825.msg3617755#msg3617755 date=1307129757]

There are lots of bots for things you would never think. I only use the good ones from rsbots.net though.

I don’t make random accs just to bot like those though. There are people who make their living off botting like 50 accounts a month and then selling the gp.

Yea I’ve seen people with 30 or 40 bots opened all cutting yews…its really getting out of control.
[/quote]
whaaa??? i can run like 2 and my ram is fucked or 3 idk i only run 1 at a time because i have 1 acc:)[/quote]
VPS, they probably don’t really run it on their pc.

Read full topic

Ban all ganite plate, d skirt, games necklace wearing “players”!

Don’t forget there all wearing d meds also :d
[/quote]
O right forgot about those, BAN EM ALL![/quote]
dont forget the rune chains aswell

i never knew bots trained there now.
